message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $11,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $9,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me. Let's see if we can work something out.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, I'm aiming for a slightly higher price point. Would you consider $10,200? This allows me to make a fair deal while acknowledging its value to you.
